name: Pago Pago Cocktail
description: Let's start the weekend right--with a cocktail recipe from Paul Clarke (The Cocktail Chronicles). Need more than one? Hit up the archives. Cheers! It's late July, and summer has now reached its cruising altitude. Your sunglasses have become as essential...
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 ounces gold Puerto Rican rum (Bacardi 8 works well here)

recipeInstructions.text: Place everything except the rum in a cocktail shaker and crush the pineapple with a muddler or wooden spoon. Add the rum and a lot of ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass (you may wish to double-strain through a mesh tea strainer in order to filter out the little bits of pineapple. Or not, if you like little bits of pineapple). Ta-da!
